mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date, quantity ) VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, #{tranCode:CHAR}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate:DATE}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date, quantity FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}
